name: Barkley Gaiden 2: The Son Of Dark Draker - Barkley Shut Up and Jam: Gaiden, Gaiden Episode 1
storyline:
In 2041, the First Dunk showed mankind the true destructive power of basketball. The Great B-Ball Purge began the next day.
In 2053, the Second and Third Dunks devastated Earth's ecosystem, killing billions and wrapping the planet in the venomous shroud of Necron.
The Year is 2065. The B-Blight now covers 70% of all arable land. The strong squabble over what few resources remain, while the weak are pushed into barely habitable 'orange zones'. No place on Earth is free of Basketball Radiation.

Only a single human can sleep easy, lightyears away, aboard the space ziggurat Tír na nÓg.
summary: A fangame based on Barkley: Shut Up and Jam Gaiden and the unfinished Barkley 2.
